inclusion.criterion: female patients with non-metastatic breast cancer
inclusion.label: met
met
inclusion.evidence: core biopsy revealed a 3 cm invasive ductal breast carcinoma

inclusion.criterion: using contraceptives if in reproductive age category
inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: She is not sexually active and has no children.

inclusion.criterion: eligible for neo-adjuvant CT after multidisciplinary decision
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient is a candidate for tumor resection and agrees to do so prior to chemotherapy.

inclusion.criterion: informed consent obtained, signed and dated before specific protocol procedures.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: She does not smoke or consume alcohol. She is not sexually active and has no children.

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: CXR was remarkable for metastatic lesions.

exclusion.criterion: history of cancer, with the exception of non-melanoma skin cancer, in situ cervix carcinoma
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has metastatic lesions on CXR, but no other exclusion criteria are mentioned.
